name: The Bone Stealer
description: The Bone Stealer is a work of interactive horror fiction. You play the protagonist of this twisted tale, as you discover and refine your unique ability: The power to steal bones in an instant, cleanly, and with no invasive procedures. Great for you, not so great for the victims of your special brand of thievery. As you progress through the various stages of your metamorphosis, changing, evolving, learning the rules that come with such a fearsome gift, you are compelled by the desire to complete a human skeleton made up of stolen bones. Nothing is more important. But do you have what it takes to finish the dark task bestowed upon you?
